author: -I'm the guy that posts your game porn-

text:
Man, this game was the product between devil and angel. The Day Stages are awesome, they are the levels sonic is all about. The Speed and also the multiple ways to walk gave them the total edge. And i'm so fucking glad they put this sonic system to Generations.

but oh boy.. why did they have to compete with God of War, bayonetta etc. The werewolf stages are awful. The control sucks, the animations were stiff, the enemies repeatable and those climbing gives me a barrel full of Rage even now after... 7 years?

Day and Night... it can't be better divided. The beautiful days and the ugly Night

text: I've played Shadow the Hedgehog, and I actually love that one. I don't know why people complained about the controls, or why he has guns. And I have played Sonic 3D Blast, one of my favorite Sonic games actually. I didn't get why this one was hated either. It's just those games that I listed in my previous comment were the only 3D ones I've never played.
author: SmashLuigiFan1

text: You clearly never played the awful ones.
author: acemanmkiii

text: Unleashed had some awesome music. I think that's one of the main reasons I kept going with Unleashed cause the music was just so good. Unleashed wasn't too bad. Day level stages were a blast to play and the night stages were weird, sure, but as long as the whole game wasn't about it, then I was fine. Eggmanland however. That stage was HARD.
author: TheGrottoMotto

text: For the most part. It really is up to each specific player as to weather he/she will like a game. So Secret Rings and Black Knight are up for grabs. But there are enough universal reasons as to why 2006 was the lowest point for 3D Sonic games. Enjoy
author: rawblink

text: I love that you can look past the popularity and general public view of a game to bring out what's truly great about it. High five, dude.

text: Sonic Adventure 1&2 + Sonic Heroes are the only ones I've really liked so far. But the multiplayer on Sonic06 was actually really funny
author: JFK piano

text: You say it like Shadow The Hedgehog and Sonic Heroes were good. D: The only 3D Sonics I've liked are the Adventure series and 3D Blast, lol.
author: Kitouski

text: 2006 was just buggy, rushed and unpolished. Plus it had clunky stiff controls. Aside from the nonsensical plot. If the big problems were fixed it might have been passible. It just felt like they were trying to make Sonic Adventure 3 and totally goofed in the gameplay department. Secret Rings was ok, a different take on Sonic. Mainly on rails stuff but ok. And Black Night was ok as well, the sword play was odd but decent. 06 was definitely the low point for Sonic

text: The quality of 3D Sonic titles may be questionable (though it seems it's finally getting better), but the music never let me down. Very nice temple theme I wouldn't actually expect to hear in a Sonic game. This game also has Cool Edge (Night) which is the Sonic track I've been listening to the most for a good while, love it.
